summary: Kay Hoog wants to stop the organisation "Die Spinnen" to get a certain diamond, that will give the owning woman the crown of Asia, but the man, who should be the owner of that diamond, ... See full summary »
cast: Carl de Vogt|Ressel Orla|Georg John|Rudolf Lettinger|Thea Zander|Reiner Steiner|Friedrich Kühne|Edgar Pauly|Meinhart Maur|Paul Morgan|Karl Römer|Paul Rehkopf|Lil Dagover
title: Die Spinnen, 2. Teil - Das Brillantenschiff
